mode_silhouette_desc: Guess the armor by its silhouette
hint_block_title: Guess which Saint Seiya character it is
hint_default_msg: No hints available for this character.
form_placeholder: Type the name of the Saint
result_character_was: The character of the day was:
stats_history_msg: Complete your first game to see your statistics!
footer_legal_disclaimer: Saint Seiya ¬© Masami Kurumada/Shueisha, Toei Animation. All rights to the series are reserved to their respective owners. This site is a tribute to the original work.
app_description: Daily guessing game featuring Saint Seiya characters
prop_armor_desc: The armor worn by the Saint (e.g., Bronze Cloth, Silver Cloth, Gold Cloth).
help_rule_1: The goal is to guess the Saint Seiya character of the day in as few attempts as possible. Type the name of a Saint to begin.
help_indicator_green: The characteristic (Gender, Rank, Army, etc.) is CORRECT.
help_indicator_up: The value (Age, Height, Weight) of your guess is LOWER than the correct one ‚Äî try a character with a HIGHER value.
help_indicator_down: The value (Age, Height, Weight) of your guess is HIGHER than the correct one ‚Äî try a character with a LOWER value.
help_rule_2: Use the arrows (‚ñ≤/‚ñº) to navigate the suggestions and guide your guesses. Press Enter to select one.
help_available_hints_msg: Two text hints are available: Hint 1 unlocks after {hint1} attempts, and Hint 2 after {hint2} attempts.
help_footer_tip: Navigate suggestions with the 'Up/Down Arrow' keys and confirm with 'Enter'.
help_properties_intro: Here are the details of each column ‚Äî use them to interpret the indicators displayed in the grid.
prop_age_desc: E.g.: 13, 18, 248. The system indicates whether the secret value is higher or lower than your guess (‚ñ≤/‚ñº).
prop_height_desc: E.g.: 165cm, 188cm. The system shows if the secret value is higher or lower than your guess (‚ñ≤/‚ñº).
prop_weight_desc: E.g.: 53kg, 87kg. The system shows if the secret value is higher or lower than your guess (‚ñ≤/‚ñº).
prop_sign_desc: E.g.: Leo, Virgo, Pisces. Used mainly for Gold Saints and related characters.
prop_rank_desc: E.g.: Bronze Saint, Silver Saint, Gold Saint, Marina, Specter, Pallasite, Saintia.
prop_army_desc: E.g.: Sanctuary (Athena), Marine (Poseidon), Underworld (Hades), Asgard (Odin), Pallas (Pallas), Mars.
prop_training_desc: E.g.: Greece, Siberia, Andromeda Island, Five Ancient Peaks.
prop_saga_desc: E.g.: Classic, Asgard, Poseidon, Hades, Lost Canvas, Omega. Characters can appear in multiple sagas (overlaps possible).
news_intro_message: Stay up to date with the latest improvements and features of Saint Seiya DLE:
news_desc_streak: Your win streak calculation has been revised for greater accuracy and reliability. Try to beat your record!
news_desc_determinism: The Daily Character is now the same for all players worldwide, regardless of cache or device.
news_desc_i18n: The entire translation system was improved, making it easier to add new languages in the future. The game is ready to expand!
export_desc: Download a backup of your progress (statistics and current game) to save or transfer to another device.
import_desc: Upload a backup file (.json) to restore your stats and saved game.
import_success_reload: Data imported successfully! The page will reload.
import_export_error_invalid_format: Invalid file format. Please upload a JSON file.
import_export_error_corrupted: Backup file is corrupted or missing essential data.
import_export_error_parse: Failed to read or parse the file content.
import_export_error_generic: An unknown error occurred during the operation.
import_export_success_reload: Data imported successfully! The page will reload.
quote_help_objective_desc: Guess which Saint Seiya character said the quote of the day in as few attempts as possible.
quote_help_how_desc: Read the quote and use the hints to guess which character said it. Type the Saint‚Äôs name and submit your guess.
yesterday_character_desc: See the character featured in yesterday‚Äôs game.
attack_form_placeholder: Type the name of the attack
attack_blur_info: The blur decreases automatically after {attempts} attempts.
attack_blur_info_on: The blur will automatically decrease after {attempts} attempts.
attack_blur_info_off: The blur will remain at maximum.
attack_help_controls_desc: You can use the toggles to adjust difficulty:
attack_help_toggle_blur_desc: Controls whether the blur decreases automatically with each attempt (ON) or stays at maximum (OFF).
attack_help_toggle_color_desc: Controls whether the GIF is shown in black and white (ON) or reveals colors (OFF).
attack_help_no_hints_desc: This mode is a 'pure recognition challenge'. No text hints are available; progressive image reveal serves as your only aid.
silhouette_help_objective_desc: Guess which Saint Seiya armor is featured today in as few attempts as possible.
silhouette_help_how_desc: The silhouette image starts highly zoomed in. Each wrong guess decreases the zoom, revealing more of the armor.
silhouette_help_toggle_zoom_desc: Controls whether the zoom decreases automatically with each attempt (ON) or stays at maximum (OFF).
silhouette_help_no_hints_desc: This mode is a pure visual recognition challenge. No text hints; progressive reveal is the only aid.
silhouette_question_title: Which Armor is this silhouette from?
silhouette_zoom_info: Each attempt slightly decreases the zoom.
silhouette_zoom_info_on: On: Each attempt decreases the zoom.
attack_help_objective_desc: Guess which character performs the attack shown in the GIF.
attack_help_how_desc: Type the name of a character in the guess field. You‚Äôll receive instant feedback if you‚Äôre right or wrong.
attack_help_feedback_desc: With each guess, you‚Äôll immediately see whether the character was correct or incorrect:
share_title_classic_win: I guessed the character in #SaintSeiyaDLE in {count} attempt(s)! üèõÔ∏è
share_title_classic_lose: I couldn‚Äôt guess the character in #SaintSeiyaDLE today... üíî

share_title_silhouette_lose: I couldn‚Äôt guess the silhouette in #SaintSeiyaDLE today... üíî
share_title_attack_win: I guessed the attack in #SaintSeiyaDLE in {count} attempt(s)! üí•
share_title_quote_win: I guessed the quote in #SaintSeiyaDLE in {count} attempt(s)! üí¨
share_title_quote_lose: I couldn‚Äôt guess the quote in #SaintSeiyaDLE today... üíî
